embed-form.heading: Embed on your website
embed-form.introduction: Copy the code bellow to embed this on your website.

donate-form.introduction: ICIJ’s investigations are supported by readers like you. Help keep our databases free and open to the public by joining our ICIJ Insiders community.
donate-form.label: I would like to donate

result.sentence: With this donation, you are changing the %{target}.

benefits.heading: ICIJ Insiders benefits
benefits.introduction: Your monthly or annual donation will give you the following benefits.

rules.heading: Change the rules
list: Opportunity to submit your question to ICIJ staff. Several questions will be answered in our quarterly ICIJ Insider newsletter
Sneak previews behind the scenes of ICIJ’s work (monthly)

world.heading: Change the world
list: Invitation to exclusive chat with ICIJ staff about our latest major project after publication
Opportunity to submit your questions to ICIJ staff. Several questions will be answered in our quarterly ICIJ Insider newsletter
Sneak previews behind the scenes of ICIJ’s work (monthly)
